reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Really nice B&B, Vivien is so helpful and makes the best breakfasts ever.
reviews.title: Perfect B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms has an artistic feel to it, very different from the standard sleek design. the bed and pillows are so good!
reviews.title: So welcoming and homely

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very quiet and relaxing place too, up the hill so you will need good legs :-)
reviews.title: Lovely place, lovely host

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the Harbour view room for three nights and had a fab time. The room was lovely with fab views and Vivien was an amazing host. Nothing was too much trouble and we loved the personal touches of Viviens art work all around the house. Fresh eggs from the chickens added to the great breakfasts, home made jams and marmalade compliment the homemade bread. Vivien has an amazing knowledge of the area and supplies a bag of maps etc when you arrive. We look forward to our next stay
reviews.title: Excellence in an extremely friendly package.

reviews.text: Vivien was a brilliant host with great recommendations on where to eat and what to do. We were both really impressed with the pack of information provided included the much needed Ordanance Survey map. The room was very clean an comfortable, with an amazing selection of tea and breakfast was lovely. I was on a special diet and Vivien was happy to help. A pleasure to stay and I am sure we will be staying again in the future.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay at The Artist's House, Fowey

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We happened upon Artists House by chance after having made an enquiry at the local tourist information office, and how lucky we were. The house is in a quiet cul de sac and is a short uphill walk from the centre of Fowey. We were greeted by Vivien, the owener, in a friendly and efficient manner and after a few minuted we felt as if we had known her for years, she even had a selection of maps and local information leaflets ready for us. There are just 2 letting rooms in her lovely home and ours had a view over the garden whilst the other room enjoys a river view. Our en-suite bathroom had a spacious shower and there was a large selection of toiletries and clean towels. The bed was comfortable and there was tea and coffee making facilities, a flat screen TV and hairdryer in the room.
reviews.title: Fantastic Place to Stay
